# include <stdio.h>
# include <iostream>
# include <string>
# include <string.h>
# include <stdlib.h>
# include <sstream>
# include <math.h>

using namespace std;

int main(void)
{
	int n,m;
	cin >> n >> m;
	int *space = new int[n*m];
	for(int i = 0 ; i < n ; i++){
		for(int j = 0 ; j < m ; j++){
			cin >> space[i*m+j];
		}
	}
	int t_cases,px,py,qx,qy,sum;
	cin >> t_cases;
	while(t_cases--){
		cin >> px >> py >> qx >> qy;
		px--;py--;qx--;qy--;
		sum = 0;
		for(int i = px ; i <= qx ; i++){
			for(int j = py ; j <= qy ; j++){
				sum += space[i*m+j];
			}
		}
		cout << sum << "\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
